Verses: 1 appozhudhu Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Enakku Undaagi, Avar:

2 manupuththirane, Nee Un Mugaththai Erusalemukku Neraagath Thiruppi, Parisuththa Sthalangalukku Virodhamaaga Un Vasanaththaip Pozhindhu, Isravel Dhesaththukku Virodhamaagath Theerkkadharisanam Uraiththu,

3 isravel Dhesaththai Nokki, Karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiradhu Ennavendraal, Idho, Naan Unakku Virodhamaaga Vandhu, En Pattayaththai Adhin Uraiyilirundhu Uruvi, Unnil Sanmaarkkanaiyum Dhunmaarkkanaiyum Sangaarampannuven.
4 naan Unnil Sanmaarkkanaiyum Dhunmaarkkanaiyum Sangaarampannappogirapadiyinaal Therkuthuvakki Vadakkumattumulla Ellaa Maamsaththukkum Virodhamaai En Pattayam Adhin Uraiyilirundhu Purappadum.
5 appozhudhu Karththaraagiya Naan En Pattayaththai Adhin Uraiyilirundhu Uruvinen Enbadhai Ellaa Maamsamum Ariyum; Adhu Ini Uraikkul Thirumbuvadhillai.
6 aadhalaal Manupuththirane, Un Iduppu Norungumpadi Perumoochchuvidu; Avargal Kangalukku Munbaaga Manankasandhu Perumoochchuvidu.

7 nee Edhinimiththam Perumoochchuvidugiraai Endru Avargal Unnidaththil Kettaal, Nee Avargalai Nokki: Dhurchcheydhi Varugiradhinimiththame; Adhinaal Irudhayangalellaam Urugi, Kaigalellaam Thalarndhu, Manamellaam Thiyangi, Muzhankaalgalellaam Thanneeraippola Alaivunnum; Idho, Adhu Vandhu Sambavikkum Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiraar Endru Sol Endraar.
8 karththarudaiya Vaarththai Enakku Undaagi, Avar:
9 manupuththirane, Nee Theerkkadharisanam Uraiththu, Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal: Pattayam Koormaiyaakkappattadhu, Pattayam Koormaiyaakkappattadhu; Adhu Thulakkappattumirukkiradhu.

10 magaa Sangaarancheyvadharku Adhu Koormaiyaakkappattirukkiradhu; Minnaththakkadhaai Adhu Thulakkappattirukkiradhu; Sandhoshappaduvomo? Adhu En Kumaaranudaiya Kol, Adhu Sagala Virutchangalaiyum Alatchiyampannum.

11 adhaik Kaiyaadumpadi Adhaiththulakkak Koduththaar; Kollugiravan Kaiyile Kodukkumpadi Andhap Pattayam Koormaiyaakkappattirukkiradhu; Adhu Thulakkappattadhumaayirukkiradhu Endru Karththar Uraikkiraar Endru Sol.

12 manupuththirane, Nee Olamittu Alaru; Pattayam En Janaththinmel Varum; Adhu Isravel Prabukkal Ellaarmelum Varum; Adhinimiththam En Janaththukkulle Thigil Undaayirukkum; Aagaiyaal Un Vilaavile Adiththukkol.
13 yaavaiyum Kandikkira Kol Vandhaalozhiya Ini Sodhanaiyinaal Theerugiradhennavendru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar.

14 aagaiyaal Manupuththirane, Nee Theerkkadharisanam Solli, Kaiyode Kaikottu; Pattayam Moondrudharam Rattiththuvarum; Adhu Kolaiyundavargalin Pattayam; Adhu Kolaiyunnappogira Periyavargalin Ullaraigalil Pravesikkira Pattayam.

15 avargaludaiya Irudhayam Karaindhu, Avargaludaiya Idaiyoorugal Thiralaagumpadi, Pattayaththin Koormaiyai Avargaludaiya Ellaa Vaasalgalukkum Neridak Kattalaiyiduven; Aa, Adhu Minnumpadiyaagap Padhamidappattadhu, Vettumpadiyaagath Theettivaikkappattadhu.
16 egabalamaai Valadhupuramaaga Vettu, Thirumbi Idadhupuramaagavum Vettu; Un Mugam Thirumbugira Thikkellaam Vettu.
17 naan Kaiyode Kaikotti, En Ukkiraththai Aarappannuven Endru Karththaraagiya Naan Sonnen Endraar.
18 pinnum Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Enakku Undaagi, Avar:

19 manupuththirane, Baabilon Raajaavin Pattayam Varaththakkadhaaga Iranduvazhigalaik Kuriththukkol; Irandum Ore Dhesaththilirundhu Varavendum; Nee Oru Idaththaith Therindhukol, Nagaraththukkup Pogira Vazhiyin Munaiyil Andha Idaththaith Therindhukol.
20 pattayam Ammon Puththirarin Pattayamaagiya Rappaavukku Virodhamaaga Varaththakka Oru Vazhiyaiyum, Yoodhaavil Irukkira Aranaana Erusalemukku Virodhamaaga Varaththakka Oru Vazhiyaiyum Kuriththukkol.
21 baabilon Raajaa Irandu Vazhigalin Munaiyaagiya Vazhippirivile Nimiththam Paarkkiradharkaaga Nirpaan; Ambugalaith Theetti, Vikkiragangalai Usaavi, Eeralaal Kuripaarppaan.

22 thalaivarai Niyamikkiradharkum, Sangaarancheyyumpadi Aarpparikkiradharkum, Gembeeramaai Saththamidugiradharkum, Vaasalgalai Muttum Yandhirangalai Vaikkiradharkuma, Manmedu Podugiradharkum, Koththalangalaik Kattugiradharkum, Erusalemaikkuriththu Nimiththam Paarkkudhal Avanudaiya Valadhupuraththile Undaayirukkum.
23 indha Nimiththamaanadhu Aanaiyittavargalukku Munbaagap Poiyaagath Thondrum; Aayinum Avargal Pidikkappadumpadi Avan Avargal Dhrogaththai Ninaippaan.

24 aagaiyaal Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Ungal Dhrogangal Veliyarangamaagiradhinaalum, Ungal Seygaigalilellaam Ungal Paavangal Theriyavarugiradhinaalum, Neengal Ungal Akkiramaththai Ninaikkappannugireergale; Neengal Ippadippattavargalendru Ninaikkappadugireergale; Aadhalaal Kaippidiyaai Pidikkappaduveergal.
25 isravelai Aalugira Avabakthiyulla Dhunmaarkka Adhipadhiye, Akkiramaththukku Mudivuvarunkaalaththil Un Naal Vandhadhu.
26 paagaiyaik Kazhatru, Kreedaththai Eduththuppodu; Adhu Ini Munpoliraadhu; Thaazhndhavanai Uyarththi, Uyarndhavanaith Thaazhththuven.
27 adhaik Kavizhppen, Kavizhppen, Kavizhppen; Urimaikkaaranaanavar Varumattum Adhu Illaadhirukkum; Avarukke Adhaik Koduppen Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar.
28 pinnum Manupuththirane, Nee Theerkkadharisanam Sollu: Ammon Puththiraraiyum Avargal Sollum Nindhanaigalaiyum Kuriththuk Karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiradhu Ennavendraal,

29 akkiramaththukku Mudivu Varunkaalaththil Vandha Thangaludaiya Naalukku Edhuvaagi, Kolaiyunduponavargaludaiya Pidarigalodekooda Ennai Dhunmaarkkarin Kaiyinaal Vizhappannumpadikku, Unakku Abaththamaanadhu Dharisikkappadugirapodhum, Unakkup Poinimiththam Paarkkappadugirapodhum Pattayam Uruvappattadhu, Pattayame Uruvappattadhu; Vettavum Sangarikkavum Adhu Minnaththakkadhaaith Thulakkappattirukkiradhu.
30 un Pattayaththai Nee Thirumba Adhin Uraiyile Podu; Nee Sirushtikkappatta Sthaanamaagiya Un Jenmadhesaththile Naan Unnai Nyaayantheerththu,
31 en Sinaththai Unmel Ootruven; Naan En Moorkkaththin Akkiniyai Unmel Oodhi, Mirugagunamullavargalum, Azhikkiradharkuth Thiramaiyullavargalumaagiya Manusharin Kaiyil Unnai Oppukkoduppen.
32 nee Akkinikku Iraiyaavaai; Un Raththam Un Dhesaththin Naduvil Sindhikkidakkum; Nee Ini Ninaikkappaduvadhillai; Karththaraagiya Naan Idhai Sonnen Endraar.
